trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_SEQ_00<tab>Estinien is understandably bewildered.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Estinien at Tertium.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Jullus.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Alisaie again.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the spirited engineer.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_VARSHAHNBIG_000_000<tab>Sister...was it really you?
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_YSHTOLA_000_005<tab>We have no reason to doubt Vrtra. Let us depart for Garlemald as soon as possible.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_010<tab>So that was a dragon's roar. Quite a trick, imbuing one's voice with aether.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ESTINIEN_000_020<tab>By all accounts, Azdaja is Golbez's prisoner, yet if she was in the Source...
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ESTINIEN_000_021<tab>It could be that she managed to escape from the void, if only for a fleeting moment.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ESTINIEN_000_022<tab>But that is mere conjecture. If we want the truth, then we must go and find it.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ESTINIEN_000_024<tab>Come, let's make for Tertium. Our friends are waiting.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_VARSHAHNBIG_000_030<tab>I thought to depart from Radz-at-Han sooner, but Y'shtola insisted I bring warmer clothes.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_VARSHAHNBIG_000_031<tab>This vessel does not feel cold as such, but she reminded me that, so long as I am Varshahn, it would be prudent not to appear overly conspicuous.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_YSHTOLA_000_035<tab>I trust you know the “associates” who will be joining us. Hopefully they have been keeping well.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_040<tab>People live in such places, do they? Not that I would presume to know their preferences, but it seems...uncomfortable.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_VARSHAHNBIG_000_050<tab>I had tempered my hopes, but thanks to Alphinaud and Alisaie, we might yet learn something of Azdaja.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_YSHTOLA_000_055<tab>Nothing appears to be out of the ordinary here at the camp. Let us see what we find at this village.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ESTINIEN_000_060<tab>I knew the twins wouldn't disappoint.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_065<tab>A village of voidsent users... Lest you think I have feelings on this─I don't. What others do is not my concern.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>I expect it's been a while since you spoke with Jullus. He will be glad to see you.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_075<tab>The people here struggle to survive as it is. The last thing they need is for Garlemald to be overrun with voidsent.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_080<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What a welcome surprise.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_081<tab>And I see you're traveling with a large crew as usual...
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_082<tab>Not to suggest that's an inconvenience for us. We'd be happy to share our supplies with you and your allies, should you require any.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALPHINAUD_000_084<tab>Apologies if we interrupt, Jullus, but there is a matter we wish to discuss.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_085<tab>We've just finished our routine briefing, so you come at a good time. Is this about the voidsent?
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALPHINAUD_000_086<tab>It is. From what we can discern, they're coming from the mountains to the east.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALPHINAUD_000_087<tab>Practitioners of the reaper arts once lived in that area, did they not?
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_088<tab>Yes, they had a village there in the Lapis Manalis caverns.

TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_089<tab>The scythe-wielders forged pacts with voidsent, and took to battle with the beings at their side. For a time they played an invaluable role in our military, but the advent of magitek saw them fall out of favor.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_090<tab>And when some were unmasked as insurrectionists, the order was outlawed. The village is believed to be long abandoned.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_091<tab>Speaking of their art...it seems you've picked it up. Who was it that taught you?
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_092<tab>...Well, I suppose it's neither here nor there now.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_VARSHAHNBIG_000_093<tab>My sister has been taken captive by voidsent. I sensed her presence in this land, and have come in search of her.

TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_VARSHAHNBIG_000_094<tab>If voidsent have been sighted here, then I believe there is a connection. We should like to investigate these caverns you mention, but Alphinaud tells us they are not easily reached.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_095<tab>I'm afraid so. Deep snow and tumultuous winds rule out walking and flying.

TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_096<tab>If you want to get anywhere, you're going to need a magitek snowcraft. Alas, the last remaining functional one we had has broken down. Should still be over in Cerulea Ingens, where it was abandoned.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_097<tab>Is there anyone who can fix it?
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_098<tab>Perhaps the former engineers at Tapper's Den.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_099<tab>Their duty included transporting ceruleum tanks to Juturna Platform G using snowcraft. I expect they had to maintain a few over the years.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_100<tab>That's worth looking into, I'd say.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_101<tab>In the course of delivering provisions, I've come to know the people there quite well. If they can help us, I'm sure they will.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALPHINAUD_000_102<tab>May I ask you to accompany her? Given the presence of voidsent, it's best that we avoid traveling alone.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_VARSHAHNBIG_000_103<tab>In the meantime, will you not tell me more about the mountain? I would like to learn as much as I can before commencing our search in earnest.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_JULLUS_000_104<tab>Come with me. I'll introduce you to someone who's well versed in the local geography.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_105<tab>Alisaie, was it? I wish to speak with you.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_0106<tab>In that case, why don't you come with us to Tapper's Den? We can chat on the way.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>I shall go and brief the contingent on the voidsent issue, that they too may be prepared.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_115<tab>If you want to eavesdrop, be my guest. It doesn't matter to me.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_116<tab>...
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_117<tab>We should get back to it, but before we do...
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_118<tab>Are you all right, Zero? Did I say something that confused or upset you?
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_119<tab>...No. I'm simply trying to understand your perspective. If you wish to continue, I am ready and able.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_100_119<tab>Well, that's a relief! This isn't the sort of place you want to mull over things.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_110_119<tab>It's not much farther to Tapper's Den. I doubt we'll have much trouble finding an engineer when we arrive, so let's speak with the first one we spot.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_120<tab>This is one of the engineers, I think.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_125<tab>Because it's the right thing to do...
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ENGINEER04671_000_130<tab>Wait, I know you. You're the one who roughed up the guards!
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ENGINEER04671_000_131<tab>After you left, your contingent friends came along. Our lives are a lot easier now thanks to them.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ENGINEER04671_000_132<tab>They understood our plight, and offered to help─whether we wanted to stay here or return home. For that, we're truly grateful.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ENGINEER04671_000_133<tab>We're grateful to you too, Alisaie. The trip across the lake is hardly pleasant, but you make it all the same to bring us provisions.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_134<tab>Oh, don't mention it. We're just glad we can help.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_135<tab>That said, we were actually hoping to ask a favor of <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> today...
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_136<tab>We need a magitek snowcraft repaired─the one abandoned in Cerulea Ingens. We were told you might be up to the task.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ENGINEER04671_000_137<tab>Ah, so you want to ride the mammoth!
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ENGINEER04671_000_138<tab>That's what we took to calling the crafts on account of their size.

TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ENGINEER04671_100_138<tab>As often as I used them on rigs, I know a thing or two about their maintenance. I'll see if I can get your mammoth roaring again─it's the least I can do to repay your kindness.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_139<tab>Wonderful! Please come with us back to Camp Broken Glass, and we'll take it from there.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_140<tab>So far so good, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Let's be on our way.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_150<tab>Thank goodness we were able to find someone to help with repairs.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_155<tab>You mortals are more sensitive to the cold than I realized. My body is made differently, so I feel nothing.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ENGINEER04671_000_160<tab>Don't you worry─the mammoth is in good hands!
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALPHINAUD_000_170<tab>Welcome back.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALPHINAUD_100_170<tab>I presume this is the engineer who will help us with the craft?
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ENGINEER04671_000_171<tab>I'll do everything I can to get her up and running again!

TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ENGINEER04671_000_172<tab>But I doubt I'll be able to do so quickly─at least on my own. The mammoth is big, and so are its parts. Some strong backs should make the work go faster.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ESTINIEN_000_173<tab>You have ours.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALPHINAUD_000_174<tab>You've finished learning about the mountain, I take it?
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_VARSHAHNBIG_000_175<tab>Aye, we have a solid grasp of that area, as well as the site of the snowcraft.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_YSHTOLA_000_177<tab>My back is perhaps not as strong as some, but I should be glad to stand guard for voidsent and other unruly wildlife.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ENGINEER04671_000_178<tab>Much obliged, miss. Then let's all head over to the mammoth and assess what needs fixing.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALPHINAUD_000_179<tab>They have matters here well in hand. Which means we can resume our duties.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALPHINAUD_000_180<tab>Would you care to assist us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_181<tab>How about you, Zero?
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_182<tab>I will assist you as well. As payment for answering my question.
TEXT_AKTKMJ102_04671_ALISAIE_000_183<tab>It's hardly something that demands payment...but we'd be glad for your contribution nonetheless.
